name: The problem of historical data availability in EVM chains
description: This presentation will try to explain what the problem of historical data availability is in EVM chains, why it exists and how we can try to tackle it.

speakers.name: Lefteris Karapetsas
speakers.bio: Ethereum developer since 2014! Contributed to the solidity compiler and C++ ethereum. Built the DAO, saw it get destroyed, then hacked it back to save whatever we could both in ETH and ETC. Development lead for the Raiden network. Founder of rotki. I like birding :D

speakers.name: Yabir Garcia
speakers.bio: Backend developer for rotki. Background on mathematics and CS
